projects.title: PROJECT: 'ArTree' GREEN CITY PLANNING - BREMEN, GERMANY
projects.postDrescription: Building a plant-like structure using “Breaking folds”. Name: <ArTree>. ● Purpose of the <ArTree>: Primarily generation of electricity using artificial photosynthesis. To enhance the landscape, efficient use of public space, central energy systems, and greenery, associated with climate change, helps with shadows during summers.

projects.title: Rainwater harvesting
projects.postDrescription: Water, an indispensable resource for life, is facing increasing challenges due to climate change, population growth, and over-extraction from traditional sources.
